game.name: Jewel Christmas
game.description:
Oh wow! The highly addictive arcade challenge is waiting for you on atmegame.com! Have you not tried it out yet? Join Jewel Christmas and get a chance to combine 3 or more tiles together to create a chain reaction! There are plenty of Christmas decoration items to explore here. Your primary goal in this unique matching challenge is to match any three fun Xmas decorations to make them explore. Relax with no time limits and moves in a mobile-friendly game!
Choose any mode out of Infinity, Action, Escape, Downfall and Blocker in this html5 puzzle challenge! You would notice the twinkle bells in the playground and some other items of the festive season. Match groups of three or more Christmas trees, stockings, gingerbread men and more in this festive themed match-three game! You would be rewarded with some points after making an each combo. Keep swapping some designated pieces to clear each level in this match-3 game! A good eye and quick thinking ability will guide you to achieve your mission. 
Whilst most of match 3 games generally include matching different types of gems or jewels, this cool mobile puzzle challenge will allow you to match multiple Christmas themed goodies. Of course, matching more than 3 items together will help to create a special item for you. Get ready to meet with a super item by matching 5 of the same items in a row! You can remove all of the chosen items with the help of a super item. Check out more gaming modes in our extensive arcade challenge and enjoy the Christmas spirit together without download!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Jewel Christmas at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Puzzle games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE TO MATCH THE SAME IMAGES IN ROWS AND COLOUMS,CONNECT ATLEAST 3 IMAGES
game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS L CLICK OF MOUSE ANS SWIPE TO MATCH THE SAME IMAGES IN ROW AND COLOMS, MATCH AT LEAST 3 IMAGES
